name: Blizzard 2 (V)
Lore: 'AT-AT commanded by the treacherous General Nevar before he was assassinated. Fortified with an extra layer of armor by the paranoid general. Enclosed.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During your control phase, may take one Trample or Walker Barrage into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Walker Barage total is +2. Immune to attrition < 4.',
